ai-kv1.2:131.3_0: there is a underlying tendency to sensual desire, repulsion, views, doubt, conceit, desire to be reborn, and ignorance.
ai-kv1.2:132.2_0: Because of delusion, the desireless release ...
ai-kv1.2:132.3_0: What is the source of this contact?
ai-kv1.2:133.3_0: a perfected one, a fully awakened Buddha ...
ai-kv1.2:134.3_0: And what’s the point of perfection?”
ai-kv1.2:134.5_0: Identity view, doubt, misapprehension of precepts and observances, and misapprehension of precepts and observances comes to precepts.
ai-kv1.2:134.8_0: and delusion? Do doubt come to be, and doubt of misapprehension of precepts and observances, greed, hate, and delusion?
ai-kv1.2:135.3_0: Do you become a perfected one?
ai-kv1.2:135.7_0: Do you give up three things?
ai-kv1.2:135.11_0: And you’re not a perfected one?
ai-kv1.2:136.1_0: but remain after getting rid of them?
ai-kv1.2:136.3_0: If he neither get rid of nor accumulates them, but remain after getting rid of them.
ai-kv1.2:136.4_0: “I’m a perfected one, with defilements ended.”
ai-kv1.2:137.1_0: Do they neither give up nor grasp, but remain after giving them up?
ai-kv1.2:137.3_0: And then they neither give up nor grasp, but remain after giving them up, and remain after giving them up.
ai-kv1.2:137.4_0: “I’m a perfected one, with defilements ended.”
ai-kv1.2:138.3_0: They neither discard nor amass, but remain after discarding them.
ai-kv1.2:138.4_0: “I’m a perfected one, with defilements ended.”
ai-kv1.2:139.1_0: Though they neither dissipate nor get clouded by, but remain after dissipating them?
ai-kv1.2:139.3_0: And they neither dissipate nor get clouded by, but remain after dissipating them.
ai-kv1.2:139.4_0: “I’m a perfected one, with defilements ended.”
ai-kv1.2:139.5_0: The account of the discussion was finished.
